filed_liens.description: List of filed liens with amounts and resolution status

query: What liens have been filed? [Provider] lien of $[X] resolved for $[Y] on [date]; No liens filed

expected_liens.description: Expected liens or other lien exposure including EDD, child support

query: Are there expected lien issues? EDD has sent notice of request for information; [Provider] has demand of $[X]
What is the date of this plan of action? Date:; POA dated
Who is the examiner on this claim? Examiner:; Handled by

description.description: Brief description of reserves and historical changes, including items contributing significantly

query: What are the current reserves? Outstanding reserves:; Medical reserve: $[X]

adj_number.description: ADJ number - adjudication case number from Workers' Compensation Appeals Board

query: What is the ADJ number? ADJ; WCAB case number:

legal_activity.description: Relevant hearings, depositions, trials, MSC, DOR, or other legal information

query: What is the litigation status? Claimant's deposition is set for; MSC scheduled for
Who is the defense attorney? We are represented by [attorney] of [firm]; DA:
Who represents the claimant? Applicant attorney is [name] of [firm]; Claimant is represented by

application_filed_date.description: Date application for adjudication was filed

query: When was the application filed? Application filed on; Filed application for adjudication

is_mmi.description: Whether at Maximum Medical Improvement for any or all conditions

query: When did the patient reach MMI? Found MMI on; P&S as of

mmi_details.description: MMI details including which body parts, which doctor, and date

query: Has the patient reached MMI? Found MMI for all body parts by; Not MMI for

negotiations.description: Summary of negotiations including dates, offers, demands, claimant interest

query: What are the settlement negotiations? Claimant has expressed interest in resolving; Having DA inquire about settlement interest and demand
What type of settlement is planned? Claim may be settled via C&R; All claims can be settled via full CNR

authority_status.description: Authority request and approval status, including SAR status, approval date, amount

query: What is the settlement authority status? SAR for C&R up to $[X] was approved [date]; Completing SAR for

settlement_notes.description: Additional settlement notes including barriers to settlement, future plans

query: What is preventing settlement? Not postured for settlement as claimant not interested; Approved for surgery, will evaluate after

postured_for_settlement.description: Whether claim is in position to resolve

msa_details.description: MSA details including amount, CMS review threshold, completion date, claimant obligations

query: What are the Medicare Set-Aside details? MSA completed [date] is $[amount]; CMS would review for settlement greater than $250,000

is_beneficiary.description: Whether claimant is a Medicare beneficiary

reasonable_expectation.description: Notes on reasonable expectation of Medicare entitlement within 30 months

query: Is the claimant a Medicare beneficiary? Not noted as beneficiary; Reasonable expectation of Medicare within 30 months

notes.description: Apportionment opinions from doctors, potential sources, and steps being taken to address apportionment

query: Is there apportionment? Per PTP, 100% of disability is apportioned to; [X]% is apportioned to obesity

status.description: Compensability status: accepted, delayed, denied, or partially accepted

query: Has the claim been accepted, denied, or delayed? Claim accepted based on; Delayed with decision due
When is the compensability decision due? Decision due date effectively; 90th day after employer knowledge
Why was the claim accepted, denied, or delayed? Accepted based on medical evidence and no factual disputes; Denied based on no receipt of substantial medical or legal evidence

notes.description: Additional notes including SIR breach, settlement approval requirements, re-reporting instructions

query: Are there excess carrier issues? $[X] has been paid, so any settlement of $[Y] will require excess approval; Excess closed their file and requested re-reporting at

retention.description: Self-insured retention (SIR) level - amount employer pays before excess takes over

query: What is the SIR level? Retention: $; SIR: $
Who is the excess carrier? Excess carrier:; Excess insurance carrier:

reporting_level.description: Reporting level threshold - when to notify excess carrier

query: What is the reporting level? Reporting level: $; Report when incurred amount gets to $

reportable_reason.description: Reason claim is reportable (incurred reserves, serious injury, etc.)

query: Why is this claim reportable? Reportable based on incurred reserves; Reportable based on occurrence involving serious injury

date_last_reported.description: Date of last report to excess carrier

query: When was this last reported to excess? Date last reported:; Reported to excess on

notes.description: Summary of pertinent ISO and EAMS hits, prior claims, overlapping body parts

query: What were the ISO and EAMS results? ISO shows an MVA; EAMS results with

mpn_hcn_status.description: Medical Provider Network or Health Care Organization status

query: What is the MPN or HCN status? HCO member [X] days; Within MPN
When was the last medical visit? Last seen on; Most recent visit:
When is the next appointment? Follow-up scheduled for; Return visit on

treatment_summary.description: Relevant treatment, diagnostics, medical-legal evaluations with dates. Include initial treatment, surgeries, MRIs, CTs, EMGs/NCSs, recent visits, AMEs/QMEs

query: What treatment has been provided? Patient underwent surgery on; MRI of [body part] dated

medical_legal_evaluations.description: QME, AME, or IME evaluations and findings

query: Have there been any medical-legal evaluations? QME with Dr. [name] on; AME report dated

primary_treating_physician.description: Primary treating physician name and specialty

query: Who is the primary treating physician? Treating with Dr.; PTP:

action_items.description: Specific action items and next steps

query: What are the next steps? Will evaluate for; Await receipt of

next_poa_date.description: Next plan of action date or diary date

query: When is the next plan of action due? Next POA date:; Diary date:

next_poa_draft.description: A draft of the next plan of action for the next POA cycle. Review and cite applicable codes in the labor code chapter 408 workers compensation benefits PDF.

state_regulations.description: The state where the claim was filed.

prior_claims.description: List of all prior open and closed claims with relevant details

query: Are there other claims for this claimant? Prior claims:; Claimant has [X] open claims

body_parts.description: Body parts involved in prior claim

date_of_injury.description: Date of injury for prior claim

status.description: Employment status: actively employed or separated

query: Is the employee still working for the employer? EE was terminated; Employee remains active
When did employment end? Terminated on; EE termed

separation_type.description: Type of separation if applicable (e.g., terminated, retired)

query: How did employment end? Terminated due to; Employee retired

employment_notes.description: Additional employment notes (seasonality, concurrent employment, part-time, on leave, interactive process, etc.)

query: Are there special employment circumstances? Seasonal employee during; Part-time employment
What body parts have been accepted? Accepted for [body parts]; We are accepting the following:

coverage_notes.description: Additional coverage and employment verification notes

query: Are there coverage or employment issues? Partial coverage for CT; Application filed against wrong employer

coverage_confirmed.description: Whether coverage existed for the date of injury

query: Was there coverage on the date of injury? Employer was a member on; Coverage confirmed for DOI

employee_confirmed.description: Whether claimant was an employee on the date of injury

query: Was the claimant an employee on the date of injury? Claimant confirmed as employee; Employee on DOI

member_effective_date.description: Member effective date or coverage period

query: What was the coverage period? Member effective; Coverage from [date] to [date]

work_status.description: Most recent work status including date and restrictions

query: What is the current work status? Current work status dated [date] is; No use of [body part]
Can the employer accommodate the restrictions? Employer can accommodate; Employer unable to offer accommodated work

employer_can_accommodate.description: Whether employer can accommodate current restrictions

notes.description: Investigation information regarding compensability, liability, nature and extent, red flags, surveillance, social media, witness statements, etc.

query: What investigation has been conducted? File referred to APEX Investigations; Surveillance conducted
Are there buffer layer notes?
What is the buffer layer retention? Buffer retention: $; Buffer layer: $

is_reportable.description: Whether claim is reportable to buffer layer

query: What is the buffer reporting level? Buffer reporting level: $

date_last_reported.description: Date of last report to buffer layer carrier

query: When was this reported to buffer? Buffer last reported:

ratings.description: Existing PD ratings from treaters and med-legal doctors, including date, doctor, rating percentages, occupational codes, and calculation details

query: What is the permanent disability rating? Per QME [name], [X]% PD; Considering Occupational Code [X]
Have PD advances been made? We have advanced PD up to; PDA issued

estimated_rating.description: Estimated PD rating if not yet final

query: What is the estimated PD rating? Estimate, considering occupational code; Estimated [X]% based on
Is there subrogation or recovery potential? No potential - no indication of at-fault third party; Under investigation - claimant alleges other driver at fault

description.description: Summary of subrogation investigation, third parties, statute of limitations, referral to subrogation attorney

query: What is the subrogation situation? Adverse party is; Other driver claims
What is the average weekly wage? AWW:; Average weekly wage of $

td_paid.description: Dates TD/lost time indemnity has been paid, including TTD, TPD, waiting period details

query: What temporary disability has been paid? TTD paid beginning [date] and on-going; TPD paid [dates]
What is the TD rate? TD rate:; Weekly rate of $

voucher_details.description: Voucher status, amount, usage, expiration date

query: Is there SJDB voucher entitlement? Claimant was issued SJDB voucher in amount of $6,000; Voucher expires on [date]

voucher_entitlement.description: Whether there is SJDB voucher entitlement or anticipated entitlement

body_parts.description: Denied, delayed, or non-admitted body parts and conditions

query: What body parts are denied or disputed? Denied:; Disputed body parts:
What body parts are involved? Injury to [body part]; Sustaining injury to

occupation.description: Claimant occupation/job title at time of injury

query: What is the claimant's occupation? [age]-year-old [occupation]; Works as a

injury_type.description: Type of injury: specific or cumulative trauma (CT)

query: Is this a specific or cumulative trauma injury? Specific injury on; Alleges cumulative trauma

claimant_age.description: Age of claimant at time of injury

query: How old is the claimant? Patient is a [X]-year-old; [X] year old [occupation]
When was the employee hired? Hire date:; Started employment on

date_of_injury.description: Date of injury or CT period

query: When did the injury occur? Date of injury:; DOI:

mechanism_of_injury.description: How the injury occurred - mechanism description

query: How did the injury occur? While [performing activity], employee; Employee was injured when

notes.description: Issues regarding disputed liability amongst employers and carriers, partial coverage, concurrent employment, reimbursement potential

query: Are there contribution or reimbursement issues? Our coverage is [X]% as pled; Concurrently employed part-time with

restrictions.description: Type of doctor, assigning doctor, date of report, and specific restrictions

query: What are the permanent work restrictions? Per QME Dr. [name]'s report dated [date]; Must be able to sit every 2 hours

employer_offer_status.description: Status of employer offering permanent work or accommodation

query: Has employer offered permanent work? Restrictions provided to employer on [date]; Await their response regarding offer
